page.title: 17OUT AND ABOUT IN ST.AGNES
page.content: THE AREA BETWEEN ST.AGNES AND PERRANPORTH IS A HAVEN FOR THE HOLIDAYMAKER. THERE ARE BEAUTIFUL CLIFFTOP WALKS AND MARVELLOUS BEACH. BUT IT IS IMPORTANT TO PLAN YOUR EXCURSION CAREFULLY. THE CLIFFS ARE HIGH AND IN PLACES SHALEY AND THERE ARE MANY DISUSED MINES, MANY OF WHICH HAVE NOW BEEN CAPPED OR FILLED IN. THE TIDAL RANGE IS QUITE CONSIDERABLE AND IT IS A GOOD IDEA TO SEEK LOCAL ADVICE BEFORE EXPLORING DISTANT COVES. THE LIFEGUARDS ARE ON HAND DURING THE SUMMER TO GIVE HELP AND GUIDANCE ON LOCAL CONDITIONS. SO ENJOY THE AREA TO THE FULL BUT TAKE CARE.
